content: The terrifying moment when Air India plane crashed into a canteen印度航空客机坠毁食堂的恐怖时刻11 hours agoShareSaveVikas Pandey, Antriksha Pathania and Zoya Mateen维卡斯·潘迪、安特里克莎·帕塔尼亚和佐娅·马丁BBC News, Ahmedabad  BBC 新闻，艾哈迈达巴德Share  分享Save  节省Getty Images  盖蒂图片社It was a balmy Thursday afternoon at the residential hostel of the BJ Medical College and the canteen was teeming with students getting lunch.那是一个温暖的星期四下午，BJ 医学院宿舍里， 食堂里挤满了正在吃午饭的学生。The room buzzed with the sound of jokes, banter between friends, and the odd ...

content: Mood swings fuelled Heston Blumenthal's genius. But the highs got higher and the lows got darker情绪波动激发了赫斯顿·布鲁门撒尔的才华。但高潮越来越高，低谷也越来越暗淡。4 hours agoShareSaveChloe Hayward  克洛伊·海沃德BBC News•chloefhaywardBBC 新闻 • 克洛夫·海沃德ShareSave  节省Shutterstock"We just wanted a relaxing conversation with our dad and we weren't able to have one," says Jack Blumenthal. title: 印度航空：艾哈迈达巴德坠机现场发现黑匣子，家属等待答案 --- Air India: Black box found at Ahmedabad crash site as families wait for answers

content: Black box found at Air India crash site as families wait for answers印度航空坠机现场找到黑匣子，家属等待答案3 hours agoShareSaveLucy Clarke-Billings  露西·克拉克-比林斯BBC News  BBC 新闻Share  分享Save  节省EPA  美国环保署A black box has been found at the site of the Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad, India's civil aviation minister said on Friday. 印度民航部长周五表示，在艾哈迈达巴德印度航空坠机现场发现了黑匣子。The flight data recorder was recovered within 28 hours by India's Aircraft Accident Investigation Bureau (AAIB), Ram Mohan Naidu Kinjarapu confirmed. 拉姆·莫...
